data.text: My Fitness AI has workouts on demand that you can find based on how much time you have.

data.heading: Diet Plans
data.text: My Fitness AI has diet plans according to your mood and health care. 400+ diet plans available..

data.heading: Workout Categories
data.text: Workout categories will help you gain strength, get in better shape and embrace a healthy lifestyle..
